title: Correct statements about charged sphere field

content.prompt:
An isolated hollow conducting sphere carries a total positive charge Q. Correct statements about the electric field produced by the charged sphere include which of the following?

  1. It is directed radially outward from the surface of the sphere.

  2. It is equal to zero outside the sphere.

  3. It is equal to zero inside the sphere.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
